short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide threads of your choosing on thebore.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This adds an X icon to the left of thread titles on thebore.com. Clicking it will hide them forever... or until you un-hide them in the extension's options dialog.
